title: The Red Letter Parables : Introducing Jesus As Master Storyteller
description: This book takes a look at forty of the most beloved parables of Jesus, arranged chronologically to put a focus on when Jesus told each story and to whom he chose to tell them....to see if there was an underlying strategy or theme to these amazing stories. Was there a "greater story" being told...in the way the Master a Storyteller chose to tell them?The author uses personal experience, humor and a deep understanding of the Scriptures to bring these amazing lessons to life.Each chapter was also designed to be perfect to be used as a devotional., not too short, not too long.....just right!!This is a fun and interesting read.
author: Bob Palumbo
